calculations.name: Date MSG
calculations.tableau_expression:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then ""
else

if [Max Date] < [Parameters].[End Date] or [Min Date]>[Parameters].[End Date] then
 "End Date is out of range. Select a date within the Min & Max Date"   
else if [Min Date] > [Parameters].[Start Date] or  [Max Date] < [Parameters].[Start Date] then 
  "Start Date is out of range. Select a date within the Min & Max Date"   
else if [Max Date] < [Parameters].[End Date] or [Min Date]>[Parameters].[End Date] 
    and [Min Date] > [Parameters].[Start Date] or  [Max Date] < [Parameters].[Start Date] then
 "Dates are out of range. Select dates within the Min & Max Date"   

else ""
END
END
END
end

calculation_context.Expression:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then ""
else

if [Max Date] < [Parameters].[End Date] or [Min Date]>[Parameters].[End Date] then
 "End Date is out of range. Select a date within the Min & Max Date"   
else if [Min Date] > [Parameters].[Start Date] or  [Max Date] < [Parameters].[Start Date] then 
  "Start Date is out of range. Select a date within the Min & Max Date"   
else if [Max Date] < [Parameters].[End Date] or [Min Date]>[Parameters].[End Date] 
    and [Min Date] > [Parameters].[Start Date] or  [Max Date] < [Parameters].[Start Date] then
 "Dates are out of range. Select dates within the Min & Max Date"   

else ""
END
END
END
end
